title: Covet Me
description: An alternate cover for this ASIN can be found here.Belle Stuart walked into my life with crimson lips, and a smart mouth to match, that made it impossible not to put her in her placeâ€”and on her knees.She should be off-limits. Claiming her was reckless. Keeping her is dangerous. But she's more than a conquest, she's my obsession.I'll do what it takes to protect her, even if it means letting her go.But she's the one woman I can't give up. She's the one woman I can't stop craving.She's the one I covet...
author: Geneva Lee
